## 2025-11-10

### Changes

- Reintroduced separate MuppetIOS support framework
- Improved build process for QuantumIOS support framework
- There will be no changes here if you use SPM or Cocoapods, however, if you manually link to the provided xcframeworks, there is now a third that must be linked. 

### Products

- Deposit
- Switch
- Manage

### Requirements

| Name  | Version |
| ----- | ------- |
| Xcode | >= 16   |
| iOS   | >= 13   |

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/atomicfi/ios-sdk/compare/3.23.0...3.24.0
